fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Destiny Bond**: Pick a target, when you die, they will die too, reusing this move will change your target.
- **Will-o-Wisp**: Reduce a player's attack to None, their role will also be cleaned when they die.
- **Poltergeist** (2x): Control a player into another one.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Mummy**: Non-Spirits who visit you have their attributes secretly disabled until you die.
